title: Have you ever wondered if Slovakia and Wales resemble one another?
itunes:author: The Slovak Spectator
itunes:summary:
Cardiffian Mike Valek, based in the Slovak town of Piešťany, compares and contrasts Slovakia and Wales on this episode of Spectacular Slovakia. He even mentions Owain Glyndŵr! Wait, who? 
 
Photo: Pixabay 
Snippets: Gwyneth Angharad (YouTube), Dinogad's Smock (YouTube) 
Presenter: Peter Dlhopolec
itunes:subtitle: Cardiffian Mike Valek, based in the Slovak town o…
